title: Day 1006
content:
# Day 1006

It is hard to overstate how crucial exercise is for happiness. Whenever I feel down I go for a run, hit the gym, or shoot some hoops. It does not matter what type of exercise you do, just that you exercise. Without fail, when I exercise it makes me feel better. Our bodies are designed to move. If we don't move then we become depressed. Simple as.

So exercise more. Your body needs it to be at peace.

12/22/24

Conor Jay Chepenik
